item.description:
Let's go out to Joe's American Bar & Grill for a nice Saturday Night Dinner with friends.

 

3.19.11 UPDATE: Between the 2 groups we have over 20 ppl that have RSVP'd for this event, to make it easy on everyone we have requested separate checks and the NEW time for this Meetup is for 4:45pm. 

IF you plans have changed and you will not be attending this Meetup, please be kind and change your RSVP on the site. Thank you!!!

 

We will have dinner, laughs and a good time. Check the calendar because we will be heading over to Metro bowl to do some Cosmic Bowling.  You will need to RSVP for the Bowling event separately.

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

 

Hope to see you at the events.

 

Donna & Janet
item.name: Dinner at Joe's American Bar & Grill
